segments.text: I'm so glad we decided to go on a cruise for our vacation .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Are you even glad that we get to buy new clothes too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Ah , that's all part of the fun . What do you think of these shorts ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: They look really good on you . They look comfortable too .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: They are . I think I'm going to get a hat too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay . I chose this swimming suit . Do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Great and white ! Which reminds me , let's pick up some heavy duty sunscreen !
segments.speaker: S2
